radiographic_examinations.findings: Minimal intimal hyperplasia; late loss of 0.47 mm, late loss index 0.17; restenosis in 2 lesions (13.3%).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 12-month follow-up, angiographic restenosis occurred in 8 lesions (61.5%), with a late loss of 1.36 mm and late loss index of 0.62.
